resources.string: " We are a manufacturer with many years of experience in machining. Our business covers low, medium and mass series production of metal parts, aluminum, stainless steel, steel, ABS, PA, or other materials according to individual requirements. Responding to market demand, we continue to invest in the expansion of the machine park, which enables us to offer a wide range of services and opportunities. \n We hope for your interest and invite you to cooperation based on partnership!"
